host_templates._comment:
{FR: Modèle pour superviser les instances Azure Front Door via l'API}
{EN: Template to check Azure Front Door resources service using API}
host_templates.alias: Template to check Azure Network Front Door service using API
host_templates.name: Cloud-Azure-Network-FrontDoor

information.author: Centreon

description.value:
**Plugin pack to monitor Azure Front Door service using RestAPI or AZCLI.**

Available Host template and related Services:

|Cloud-Azure-Network-FrontDoor-custom|
|---|
|Backend-Health|
|Health|
|Latency|
|Requests|
|Size|

This Plugin-Pack provides a Host discovery *provider* to be used with the Host discovery module.

**Plugin-Pack pour superviser les resources Azure Front Door via RestAPI ou AZCLI.**

Modèle d\'hôte disponibles et services associés:

|Cloud-Azure-Network-FrontDoor-custom|
|---|
|Backend-Health|
|Health|
|Latency|
|Requests|
|Size|

Ce Plugin-Pack fournit un *provider* Host Discovery pour le module d\'auto-découverte d\'Hôtes

information.monitoring_procedure:
# The documentation page of this Plugin-Pack requires a newer version of the Plugin Pack Manager module:

* 19.10.1 or later
* 20.04.0 or later
* 20.10.0 or later

# The related documentation is also available online on https://docs.centreon.com/, chapter 'Plugin Packs'
information.name: Azure Front Door
